content:
问题：哪个城市的顾客最多？
SQL：SELECT city, COUNT(customer_id) as customer_count FROM customers GROUP BY city ORDER BY customer_count DESC LIMIT 1;

问题：总共有多少个已完成的订单？
SQL：SELECT COUNT(order_id) FROM orders WHERE status = '已完成';

问题：单价最贵的10个商品是什么？
SQL：SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;

问题：'手机'品类的总销售额是多少？
SQL：SELECT SUM(T2.quantity * T2.unit_price) FROM products AS T1 INNER JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.product_id = T2.product_id WHERE T1.category = '手机';

问题：2024年5月，每个城市的总销售额是多少？
SQL：SELECT T3.city, SUM(T2.quantity * T2.unit_price) AS total_sales FROM orders AS T1 JOIN order_items AS T2 ON T1.order_id = T2.order_id JOIN customers AS T3 ON T1.customer_id = T3.customer_id WHERE T1.order_date >= '2024-05-01' AND T1.order_date < '2024-06-01' AND T1.status = '已完成' GROUP BY T3.city;
